name: Absol
description: The Disaster Pokémon. Every time Absol appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster Pokémon.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Any move targeting this Pokémon directly (non-area of effect moves) reduces its PP by two when activated.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.description: This Pokémon increases its critical hit range by 1 (20 to 19+, etc.)

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a dark-type move, it gets advantage on its next attack.
